==The eval tag==
The wiki syntax to create the URL looks like this:
<source lang=xml>
<eval ci="x1:X value:i:10|y1:Y value:i:2" 
      ca="x!:x1!|Fibonacci[x]:Fibonacci[x1]|Binomial[x,y]:Binomial[x1,y1]">
  Combinatoric Numbers
</eval> 
</source>
